name: snapresume-backend
description: SnapResume Lambda backend API with Express

scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && npm install --production && cp -r ../node_modules/@aws-sdk . && zip -r ../lambda-function.zip . && cd ..
scripts.package:handlers: npm run build && cd dist/handlers && npm install --production && cp -r ../../node_modules/@aws-sdk . && zip -r ../../cognito-post-confirmation.zip . && cd ../..
scripts.deploy: npm run package && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name ${FUNCTION_NAME:-snapresume-dev-api} --zip-file fileb://lambda-function.zip
scripts.deploy:cognito: npm run package:handlers && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name ${COGNITO_FUNCTION_NAME:-snapresume-dev-cognito-post-confirmation} --zip-file fileb://cognito-post-confirmation.zip
scripts.deploy:all: npm run deploy && npm run deploy:cognito
